content.question: Which of the following developments would the author have been most likely to use to support his assertion that African Americans had joined the United States “national family”?

choices.label: The actions of New South leaders to promote industrialization
The Supreme Court decision in Plessy v. Ferguson
The ratification of constitutional amendments during Reconstruction
The passage of new regulations on voting by Southern states

content.answer: The ratification of constitutional amendments during Reconstruction

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
